Seoul National University

April 2021 ~
Researcher
  • Developed reinforcement learning systems
  • Developed robotics control systems
  • Developed a fluid simulator
      • Read More
      Shape Changing Robot System

      This system adjusts the robot’s shape to minimize drag forces in environments with flowing currents. My team developed a robot system controlled by Reinforcement Learning (RL). Additionally, to address the challenges of real-world learning in aquatic environments, we implemented a fluid simulator for use in the learning environment.

    Medipixel

    November 2017 ~ June 2019
    Machine Learning Engineer
  • Developed deep learning systems
  • Developed reinforcement learning systems
  • Developed robotics control systems
  • Handled medical data (DICOM, EMR)
      • Read More
      Guidewire Navigation based on Reinforcement Learning

      This system places a stent in the target lesion of the coronary artery via a controlling manipulator made by Asan Medical Center. It is the world’s first autonomous PCI robot system. My team developed reinforcement learning-based control software. This project was awarded first place at Johnson & Johnson QuickFire Challenge.

      Read More
      Lung Cancer Diagnosis Clinical Decision Support System

      The purpose of this system is to help doctors diagnose of lung cancer. It supports diagnosis by deep learning based on detection and classification nodules.

      Read More
      NeurIPS 2018 - AI for Prosthetics Challenge

      My team participated in NeurIPS 2018 - AI for Prosthetics Challenge and took 17th place out of 401 teams. We were able to get valuable practical experiences with reinforcement learning and biomechanics domains.

    Samsung Techwin

    July 2012 ~ November 2017
    Software Engineer
  • Developed Embedded System
  • Developed Network Devices
  • Handled video CODEC (H.264, MJPEG, YUV422, YUV420)
  • Handled network protocols (RTSP, RTP, HTTP, FTP, SMTP)

      • Read More
      IoT Camera

      This new type of product is a network camera working as an IoT gateway. It gathers sensor data and provides various services, such as social protection, fire monitoring and missing child prevention, by cooperating with adjacent IoT devices.

      Read More
      Video Surveillance as a Service

      This service integrates the cloud system and network camera. It can provide necessary information from a network camera in the local network to the outside network user, all while maintaining security.

      Read More
